# Demo Document

This is a demonstration of the Markdown to ADF converter.

## Features

The converter supports:

- **Bold text** and *italic text*
- `Inline code` and ~~strikethrough~~
- [Links](https://example.com)
- @mentions for users
- Emojis like :smile: and :thumbsup:

### Code Blocks

```javascript
function greet(name) {
  console.log(`Hello, ${name}!`);
}
```

### Task Lists

- [ ] First task
- [x] Completed task
- [ ] Another task

### Tables

| Feature | Supported |
| ------- | --------- |
| Headings | Yes |
| Lists | Yes |
| Tables | Yes |

### Blockquotes

> This is a blockquote.
> It can span multiple lines.

### Smart Links

Check out this Jira issue: [PROJ-123](https://company.atlassian.net/browse/PROJ-123)

---

That's all folks! :wave:
